::Dark Rodimus::
   
  Dark Rodimus was releaved to have the spider-spy off of him. He watches as Perceptor works on it and then as it turns to dust.
   
  Rodimus: I want to find this genius.... And kill him!
   
  OOC: Preston, do we have ourselves Skywarp rebuilt in a Armada Starscream like body?

Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...> wrote:
          ----- Original Message ---- 
From: xochitla2006 <xochitla2006@...> 
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
Sent: Friday, February 15, 2008 12:37:16 AM 
Subject: Re: The Darkest Hour 

> Hdyras:
> 
> "TRELOS"hissed Hydras "Find the intruder and destroy it!"

> Perceptor: 
> 
> Perceptor worked quickly to detach the device off Dark Rodimus 

In the shuttle bay the intruder watched in seemingly rapt facination as the doors rumbled, and for the briefest of moments opened very slightly, allowing a small burst of hot air from the outside and the smallest view of the sky above. 

The intruder smiled as he suddenly appeared on the sensor grid as his stealth shielding disengaged, allowing the Predacon weapons that were attempting to track him to finally lock on. 

His armored was colored in deep blacks and purples and he had a definite new age seeker look to him with powerful upswept wings. He was tall and well built, with a broad chest and long limbs. At the moment he held a swordlike blade in his hand, and dual mounted cannons of some type where mounted on his shoulders. 

Not looking back at the cameras or weapons that were locking on, the intruder continued to stare outside and the skyline above. 

Then with a slight but distinct popping noise, he vanished from all sight as a small breeze moved the air as it was displaced - the telltale signs of when someone is teleporting!

********************************************

Perceptor is easilly able to remove the device from Dark Rodimus' neck, however it is still counting down!

Preston
(Da'minion)
